articles.title: India vs Uzbekistan: All-time head-to-head record - Khel Now
articles.description: India and Uzbekistan have met six times prior to 18 January's AFC Asian Cup encounter. Here's the head-to-head record between the teams.
articles.content: As the AFC Asian Cup 2023 unfolds, India and Uzbekistan prepare to clash in the second game of group B. The stakes are high for both teams, with India having suffered a 2-0 defeat at the hands of for… [+2460 chars]
